document_data.name: Cheetah Tribe
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Cheetah Tribe''' were a group of hunters in the [[Shaar]] in the mid–14th century [[DR]]. They roamed in the region between the [[Uthangol Mountains]] and the [[Great Rift]], southeast of [[Hardcastle (city)|Hardcastle]], and as far east as the [[Council Hills]].

The raiders of this tribe trained to run like [[cheetah]]s and charge into the fray.
